Package com.plexus.sam.audio

Interface Summary
Playlist Common interface for the different playlist implementations Playlists should keep a pointer of where in the playlist the player currently is.
Song Interface with methods that should be implemented for every supported type of Song.
 

Class Summary
DynamicPlaylist The dynamic playlist uses a policy rather than a real list to determine the next songs to be played.
DynamicPlaylist.Relevance Inner class used for storing and retreiving the playlist with XMLen/decoder
Mp3Song Implementation of the Song interface for mp3's.
Player Intelligent music player component.
PlaylistSet This is a container class that bundles the playlists, and has methods for loading and saving, analogeous to repository saving the songs and songgroups.
Repository Repository of songs and songgroups.
SimplePlaylist A simple implementation of a playlist which is simply a list of songs that can be traversed in both directions
SongGroup A songgroup is typically a group of songs of the same genre, for every directory in the repository directory we make a new songgroup named after the directory.
SongStream This class takes care of transferring bytes from an AudioInputStream (acquired from a Song) to a SourceDataLine (output line) acquired from the AudioSystem default Mixer (audio device).
